# tw-can

Utility function to efficiently merge [Tailwind CSS](https://tailwindcss.com) classes in JS without style conflicts.

```ts
import { twCan } from 'tw-can'

twCan('px-2 py-1 bg-red hover:bg-dark-red', 'p-3 bg-[#B91C1C]')
// â†’ 'hover:bg-dark-red p-3 bg-[#B91C1C]'
```

-   Supports Tailwind v3.0 up to v3.3
-   Works in all modern browsers and Node >=12
-   Fully typed
-   [Check bundle size on Bundlephobia](https://bundlephobia.com/package/tw-can)
